reviews.text: Planned to stay for 1 night but stayed for 2. Very clean and updated modern decor. Right on promenade with bright colourful lobby and very helpful staff. It was the nicest hotel over our 2 weeks travelling vacation. The hotel is booked solid over the Formula 1 race this coming weekend with returning clients over the past couple of years. Menton is a refreshing place to stay over the crazy prices and crowds of Monte Carlo and Nice...you will love the Riva Hotel!!!
reviews.title: Best Hotel for valve and location in Menton Monoco

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled as a couple

reviews.title: Excellent hotel!

reviews.text: It was perfect for our needs.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Since there was no big difference (10 Euro) between the front sea view and back rooms we chose the sea view ones and this was great!
reviews.title: Great location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Great location on the sea. Modern, nicely decorated, smallish room but big marble/granite bathroom. Why all the hotels have a tub with a hand-held wand that does not have a place to hook it high enough to be a shower is beyond me…must be a chick thing. Room 304 with large balcony to the sea. Safe, flat screen TV, Kleenex, mini-bar but no coffee maker. Good bedside reading lights. Parking with a reservation but we found street parking on a Sunday in mid-October. Free wee-fee (wi-fi). Fully controllable a/c. Well soundproofed to shield you from the pounding Med. We recommend it. They were closing November 2012 for "renovations". There is a rooftop solarium with two sort of hot tubs that we did not use..see pictures.
reviews.title: Stay here if you can

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Stayed at this hotel for two nights in September 2012. We found the hotel rooms very clean, spacious and comfortable, but a little on the pricey side for late September at 125 euro a night plus 11 euros per person for breakfast. The staff were very pleasant and helpful and spoke very good English.
reviews.title: Nice hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Hotel Riva is situatted on the water front, with a small road (with quite a lot of traffic) between the ocean and the hotel. The sound of the ocean is however so "noisy" so it nearly neutralizes the traffic . The view over the ocean is great and the hotel is in general of a high 3 star standard. The swimmingpool area were closed for the season, however I believe that this is a nice spot during summer.
reviews.title: Good value proposition

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We could park free of charge just in the front of the hotel, as a few parking spots belongs to Hotel Riva, however otherwise there is parking nearby.
reviews.title: Late season facilities let down, otherwise OK

reviews.text: The rooms are of a reasonable size/quality and so are the bathrooms,
reviews.title: Fab-U-lous!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Hotel Riva is excellent value for your money. Very easy access by bus from Nice, the bus stop is right next to the hotel. Hotel is clean and fresh, they have a good AC and a secure luggage room in case you need one.
reviews.title: Clean, comfortable and easy access!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Hotel Riva is just across the street from the nearest beach and rooms facing the sea have the most amazing view. Breakfast is quite expensive, but you can always enjoy your own breakfast sitting on the balcony admiring the fantastic view!
reviews.title: excellent location
Nice place to relax
reviews.text: we stayed here for a week recently. had a room with a balcony, 3rd floor overlooking the sea. was excellent.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: sound proofing was not great so if that's an issue that may be not so good for you. the housekeeping staff were excellent, the hotel staff were maybe a bit aloof........ certainly not friendly...... on the day we were checking out we had checked the time for check out and it was 12 noon...... as we were not leaving Menton till that evening we ahd wanted to stay in room till nearer 12 but were still going to make sure we were checked out BY 12. at 11.30 there was a phone call from reception just to make sure we were definitely going..... I don't think this was needed. Also we hired bikes and attempted to leave them on the deserted terrace and the "barman" who had never spoken to us before rushed out and said we couldn't leave them there and suggested putting them between guests parked cars and the railings on the other side..... potentially damaging the car........
reviews.title: Nice style, great location

reviews.text: Very polite and service minded personel at nice and quiet hotel. The hotel is located about 10 min. nice walk from the Old Town and just across the water front. Unfortunatly, we did not have rooms with seaview, which we at a sligthly higher cost absolutely should prioritize. Nice and clean rooms with balcony, aircondition and ok beds. A nice breakfast buffet with possibility to eat outside.
reviews.title: Pleasant stay Riva Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We really enjoyed our stay at this hotel. The reception area and dining room, together with the deck facilities on the roof have been fully modernized snd the interior is fresh, open and clean. The full breakfast each day was a good start to the day, together with the great service. We loved being on the front of the hotel with views over the sea. The rooms are a little dated but the bed was good and the place was spotless. Would we recommend this place to our friends and family? Definitely.
reviews.title: Great little hotel

reviews.text: We stayed for three nights at this hotel, the room was bright and airy and well maintained.
